all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And above all things, clothe yourselves with the bond of charity, as with a mantle, which is the bond of perfectness and peace.
Doctrine and Covenants 88:125
Quote of the Day
"When we exercise faith in God and His Son, Jesus Christ, we receive clear assurance of Their reality and of Their concern for us."
Elder Benjamin M. Z. Tai | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
